doc.after: Vishniac was an extremely diverse photographer an accomplished biologist and a knowledgeable collector and teacher of art history Throughout his life he made significant scientific contributions to the fields of photomicroscopy and time lapse photography Vishniac was very interested in history especially that of his ancestors In turn he was strongly tied to his Jewish roots and was a Zionist later in life
